name: Invasion of the Tako Nation
description:
INVASION of the TAKO NATION# A puzzle bobble like game with 1 to 4 player

This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2018, in 48h (even less), entirely in C++ using the HARFANG® 3D framework. This is a prototype of gameplay.
For educational purpose, the source-code is included along with the game.

  • Code: barr
  • Gfx 2D: Karim Sy
  • Music/SFX: DJ Seb

Source code on Github : https://github.com/harfang3d/game-invasion-of-the-tako-nation
